name: Bag of Holding
description:
Experience the joy and delight of being a Bag of Holding! Gaze in wonder as a constant stream of loot is dropped into you. Feel the thrill of sorting through all that precious treasure and delivering those priceless heirlooms into the hands of somewhat but basically never patient adventurers!

Features

  • Meticulously hand-crafted art done in MS Paint!
  • Numerous Sounds! More than you can count on one hand!
  • More loot than you know what to do with!

Made for the MS Paint Game Jam
